description: Denominators of expansion of sinh x / sin x.
references: J. M. Gandhi, The coefficients of cosh x / cos x and a note on Carlitz's coefficients of sinh x / sin x, Math. Mag., 31 (1958), 185-191.
N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, _Simon Plouffe_
extensions: More terms from _Harvey P. Dale_, Jul 10 2013
